entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
